text: Warner Leroy Baxter (March 29, 1889 â€“ May 7, 1951) was an American movie actor. Baxter became known for his role as The Cisco Kid in the 1928 movie In Old Arizona, for which he won the Academy Award for Best Actor at the 2nd Academy Awards. ==Notes== ==References== Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:1889 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio
title: Warner Baxter
